data.name: Nebula Within Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Composed by Alaric Qin, the Soundtrack of Nebula Within is a small collection of atmospheric and ambient soundscapes. Listen to these tracks as you drift off into the tide pool of your own nebula...
data.about_the_game: Composed by Alaric Qin, the Soundtrack of Nebula Within is a small collection of atmospheric and ambient soundscapes. Listen to these tracks as you drift off into the tide pool of your own nebula...
data.short_description: Composed by Alaric Qin, the Soundtrack of Nebula Within is a small collection of atmospheric and ambient soundscapes. Listen to these tracks as you drift off into your own nebula, allowing the ebb and flow of your consciousness to pull you inward.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 57 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 312 MB available space
